channel.title: postgresql on Colynn.Liu
channel.description: Recent content in postgresql on Colynn.Liu

item.title: how to use PostgreSQL
item.description: 概述 架构 常用命令 连接 # connection export PGPASSWORD=examplepassword ; psql -h 127.0.0.1 -p 5432 -U admin -d database-name 创建数据库 ## create database, use binary file `createdb` createdb example001 # create database example001; show databases Use \l or \l+ in psql to show all databases in the current PostgreSQL server. Use the SELECT statement to query data from the pg_database to
